string.value: Putting the Maple Leaf in my mouth...
I should go see #b#p9010010##k. She said she was going to tell me some special information in light of MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary...

Collect #t04001126#? It's hard to believe that it's a #b#t01012098##k... but it is said to be very potent. It's not like I need to collect a large amount. I should give it a try\n\n #i04001126# #t04001126# #b#c04001126##k / 50

I got a #b#t01012098##k! After I put it in my mouth, I feel like my abilities increasing. It feels invigorating. Oh, but what if it doesn't increase the abilities I need?\n...I'll just go see #p9010010# in two hours. I'm sure she'll know what to do.

Hello, #b#h0##k! I'll tell you something special in celebration of MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary.

#i01012098# #t01012098#

I heard this from #p9000021#, the Maple Tree keeper but supposedly there is a special Maple Leaf that brings out special powers if you hold it in your mouth.
What do you think? Isn't that amazing?

Ha~ I like that. That makes it fun for me as the instructor.\n#b#t01012098##k looks very similar to a generic #t04001126# so it's hard to tell them apart. If I didn't take lessons from #p9000021# for a week, I wouldn't know how to distinguish them either.
After a lot of practice, now I can distinguish them easily~! Collect #b50#k #b#t04001126##k which are attached to monsters and bring them to me. I'll tell you if any of them have #t01012098# in it.
You don't believe the effects of #b#t01012098##k? If you just sit there doubting, another adventurer will surpass you just like that...
You're not done collecting? #b#t04001126##k has been attached to monsters as of late, so try hunting monsters. Collect #b50#k and bring them to me.
